hos.id = dd.zp_hospital_id AND dd.doctor_id = vitv.doctor_id AND vitv.user_id = signin.key_id AND signin.state = 102 AND hos.address_id = addres.id

select sign_time, count(key_id) cu from ITV_SIGNIN
key_id=0 and state = 102
and PERIOD_DIFF(date_format(now(),'%Y%m'), date_format(sign_time,'%Y%m') ) = 1
and DATE_FORMAT(sign_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE() , '%Y%m' )
and YEARWEEK(date_format(sign_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())-1
and YEARWEEK(date_format(sign_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())
GROUP BY TO_DAYS(sign_time)
